FuncDef: The display issu connect-timer command displays the device connection timeout period.
Examples: Info: The issu connect-timer is 15 minute(s).
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the device connection timeout period, run the display issu connect-timer command. If the master/slave control board switchover has been completed during an ISSU, but the device has not been logged in to within the specified device connection timeout period, the system automatically rolls back to the pre-upgrade state.
Before you run this command, a timeout period must have been specified using the issu reset connect-timer command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
